gobblin.hive.metastore

Class HiveMetaStoreBasedRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.hive.HiveRegister
      • gobblin.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStoreBasedRegister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @Alpha
public class HiveMetaStoreBasedRegister
extends HiveRegister
    An implementation of HiveRegister that uses IMetaStoreClient for Hive registration.

    An instance of this class is constructed with a State object or obtained via HiveRegister.get(State). Property HiveRegProps.HIVE_DB_ROOT_DIR is required for registering a table or a partition if the database does not exist.

    The HiveRegister.register(HiveSpec) method is asynchronous and returns immediately. Registration is performed in a thread pool whose size is controlled by HiveRegProps.HIVE_REGISTER_THREADS.

    • Field Summary

        protected void registerPath(HiveSpec spec)
                     throws IOException
        Description copied from class: HiveRegister
        Register the path specified in the given HiveSpec.

        This method should not evaluate Predicates or execute Activitys associated with the HiveSpec, since these are done in HiveRegister.register(HiveSpec).
